main event: A witness reported observing a bright, circular disc-shaped object with a bright light in Tucson, Arizona on October 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as 50 feet in diameter and emitted a bright light from its top center., The object maneuvered silently at varying altitudes between 1,000 and 2,000 feet., Witness John Lowe reported the sighting lasting for approximately 10-15 minutes., Multiple sightings were reported around the same date and locale with similar descriptions of disc-shaped objects., One report noted a object hovering for several minutes before rapidly disappearing.
